Freelance work for a private medical clinic in Brazil. Fueled by NodeJs, AngularJs and fully mobile responsive. www.clinicabellapele.com My own personal website, the one you're currently in. I was inspired to do something a bit different from the usual. Platforms used: PHP for backend and Angular/JQuery/P5js for front end.
The official site of a multiplatform app I am developing called Donald Pump. ReactJs powering the front and Java powering the back. www.donaldpump.com Hahaha its awesome being me

Mobile app available on iOS, Android and Windows phone. Currently in development

API's

Plugin for the Corona game engine that animates individual letters of a text object. Check it out on github!

Windows Development

Super handy windows background process that works as a hotkey but more! You can open up the command prompt at the current directory you're in with the press of a button. View the project here Decided to build a virus for educational purposes only, source code can be viewed here it is a mini project I made as a personal challenge to see how easy these things are to make.

Other Projects

An AI powered by the Program-O API that mimics a conversation in whatsapp. Phone designed purely in CSS and HTML code. View the project here
Window responsive javascript snake game that can change size dependent on the size of the window. The game also calculates a max score for each window size. Clone it from github An old discontinued PHP project I made when I was a noob and is based on a collection of memes. The site featured admin backend and user suggestions on the front end.
